saloon.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a public place where alcoholic drinks were sold and drunk in the western US in the 19th century
saloon.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a comfortable room in a pub
saloon.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a car that has a separate enclosed space for your bags etc
saloon.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a large comfortable room where passengers on a ship can sit and relax
